name: Daily CMF Momentum Large-Cap Strategy
description: Momentum strategy trading daily bars of large-cap U.S. equities. Long entries are generated when the Chaikin Money Flow crosses above +0.15 and 14-day RSI is >55; exits when CMF < +0.05 or RSI <50, a 7 % protective stop is hit, or 15 % profit target is reached. Position size is fixed-fractional at 3 % of equity per trade. Strategy is long-only and operates exclusively on daily OHLCV data.
